mapper.select: SELECT * FROM group_messages WHERE deleted_by_admin = 0 AND (deleted_by_users IS NULL OR deleted_by_users NOT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userId}, '%')) AND chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId} ORDER BY sent_time desc
mapper.update: UPDATE group_messages SET deleted_by_users = CASE WHEN deleted_by_users IS NULL THEN JSON_ARRAY(#{userId}) WHEN NOT JSON_CONTAINS(deleted_by_users, JSON_ARRAY(#{userId}), '$') THEN JSON_ARRAY_APPEND(deleted_by_users, '$', #{userId}) ELSE deleted_by_users END WHERE message_id = #{messageId} and chat_room_id = #{chatRoomId};
